content: gummy bear designed by crochetcrafters1 © 2025 crochetcrafters1 - all rights reserved this pattern and its contents are only for personal use do not copy edit redistribute or sell this pattern you are welcome to sell finished products with your own photos in small quantities but if you do so please give pattern credit to crochetcrafters1 thank you and enjoy stitches and abbreviations - this pattern is written in us terminology st/sts stitch/stitches slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain single_crochet single_crochet inv decrease invisible decrease bobble bobble stitch tools and materials - 5 mm crochet hook - bernat premium #4 worsted medium - any colour - yarn needle - stitch marker - scissors - stuffing final size - height of 8 cm and width of 3 cm technical notes *use a stitch marker to indicate the start of a round *make sure you stuff the gummy bear before you sew shut *at the end of each round is a stitch count in brackets *link to the youtube video is at the bottom of the pattern gummy bear any colour round 1 make a magic_ring into the magic_ring make 6 single_crochet 6 sts round 2 make 2 single_crochet in each st around 12 sts round 3 make 1 bobble in the first st followed by 1 single_crochet into each of the next 2 sts then make 1 bobble in the next st then make 1 single_crochet into each of the next 8 sts 12 sts round 4-6 make 1 single_crochet in each st around 12 sts round 7 make 1 single_crochet in the first st then 1 bobble in the next st followed by 1 single_crochet into each of the next 2 sts then make 1 bobble in the next st then 1 single_crochet into each of the next 7 sts 12 sts round 8 make 1 single_crochet in each st around 12 sts round 9 make 6 single_crochet inv decrease 6 sts round 10 make 2 single_crochet in each st around 12 sts round 11 make 1 single_crochet into each of the first 4 sts then 1 bobble in the next st followed by 1 single_crochet into each of the next 7 sts 12 sts round 12 make 1 single_crochet in each st around 12 sts round 13 make 1 single_crochet into each of the first 2 sts then 1 bobble in the next st followed by 1 single_crochet into each of the next 5 sts then make 1 bobble in the next st then 1 single_crochet into each of the next 3 sts 12 sts round 14 make 6 single_crochet inv decrease 6 sts *stuff and fasten_off link to video https //youtu be/rt6srnwomec if you need help or have any questions feel free to message me i will respond as soon as possible and answer or clarify any questions you may have
